integration_summary.description: Successfully integrated all new learning content into the Constitution Learning Hub application

educational_modules_enhanced.title: Constitutional Bodies - Special Institutions
enhancements: Expanded content with detailed information about 6 key constitutional bodies
Added constitutional vs statutory body distinctions
Updated quiz mapping to comprehensive quiz file

educational_modules_enhanced.title: Emergency Provisions - Safeguarding Democracy
enhancements: Added historical context including S.R. Bommai case
Updated with proper safeguards and proportionality concepts

educational_modules_enhanced.title: Amendments - Growing with Time
enhancements: Added three amendment categories with voting thresholds

educational_modules_enhanced.title: Fundamental Rights - Your Constitutional Superpowers

enhancements: Comprehensive coverage of three branches of government

educational_modules_enhanced.title: Judiciary - India's Justice System
enhancements: Detailed explanation of five constitutional writs
